column1: '''''Mythlore'' 45''' (Volume 12, Issue 3) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
[[John D. Rateliff]]'s article "'And Something Yet Remains to Be Said': Tolkien and Williams" (pp. 48-54) includes several unpublished texts by [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]]: details of a brief annotation Tolkien made to a manuscript of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' after a comment from [[Charles Williams]] (p. 52); extract from a letter to Caroline Whitman Everett dated 24 June 1957 regarding Charles Williams (p. 53); extract from [[Letter to Mother Mary Anthony
column3: a letter to Mother Mary Anthony dated 12 April 1966]], also regarding Charles Williams (p. 53).<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65875 Mythlore 45. Spring 1986] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 18 November 2011)</ref>

column1: *"Dance as Metaphor and Myth in Tolkien, Lewis and Williams"
